dbScript.sqlQuery: UPDATE TB_MODULE SET IS_USED='N' WHERE MODULE_NAME='FIREARMS'
dbScript.sqlQuery1: UPDATE TB_MODULE SET IS_USED='Y' WHERE MODULE_NAME='FIREARMS'
dbScript.sqlQuery2: UPDATE TB_MODULE SET IS_USED='Y' WHERE MODULE_NAME={Global/Copied Variable Name} OR MODULE_NAME={Global/Copied Variable Name}
dbScript.sqlQuery1: UPDATE TB_MODULE SET IS_USED='N' WHERE MODULE_NAME='<%=GVariable=%>' AND MODULE_NAME='<%=GV2=%>'
